thread.title: Canada Looking into Windows 10 Possible Privacy Violations
thread.title_full: Canada Looking into Windows 10 for Possible Privacy Violations - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Canada Looking into Windows 10 Possible Privacy Violations
text: Microsoft does say that users can disable data collection features in Windows 10 at any time from the Settings screen, but the simple fact that the operating system comes with all these services turned on might actually be a problem in certain countries across the world. In Canada, for example, local authorities are looking into Windows 10 to make sure that it complies with the country’s legislation and that no privacy violation occurs. The news comes via »
